=== WP Custom Sidebars ===
Author: mnmlthms.com
Author URL: http://mnmlthms.com
Description: Create unlimited sidebars for pages/posts/categories (...) easily without writing a single line of code
License: GNU General Public License v3.0

= v1.0.2
************************************
* Now Supported Importing sidebars from old sidebar generator
* Updated Translation files
* Bugfixes and improvements

= v1.0.1
************************************
* Now Supported overidding sidebars for Categories, Tags and Custom Taxonomies
* Updated Translation files
* other improvements
* Fixed Minor bug

= v1.0
************************************
* First release!
